reviewText: It's hard to judge how reliable the info. presented here is -- editing for the purpose of manipulation is all too easy.  But given that caveat, this video not only illustrates the way political correctness on our college campuses trumps free speech and rational thought, it does so with humor and wit (and a catchy musical score). All college students and their parents would greatly benefit from seeing this -- but also anyone interested in seeing how academia uses its hallowed halls to push a leftist agenda (and punishes students who dare to dissent).
